episodes.original_body:
Case: Bryson-Brown-MVA-6-29-2025
Client: Bryson Brown

Voicemail Preview:
"Hi, my name is Johnny Kulin. I was wondering if you could please give me a call back. My son was involved in an auto accident. His father has used you before and he recommended we get in touch with you. My phone number 527122765. Thank you so much." 
Listen to this message over your phone or log in to your RingCentral account with your main number, extension number, and password. You can also manage your voicemails in your RingCentral account.
episodes.natural_language:
Case Bryson-Brown-MVA-6-29-2025 involves client Bryson Brown. A voicemail was left by Johnny Kulin requesting a callback. In the message, Kulin states that his son was involved in an auto accident and that the son’s father has used the firm before and recommended contacting us. He provides the phone number 527122765.

The note also includes instructions for accessing the voicemail: listen to this message over your phone or log in to your RingCentral account with your main number, extension number, and password. You can also manage your voicemails in your RingCentral account.
episodes.author: Justin Chumbley

__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__ LMEMS to Hospital St. Mary on Bluegrass
Neck and back pain, right knee pain, was placed in knee brace

Bryson Brown

Ph: 502-500-3521

Shively KY 40216

6/29/25 DOA

PIP Allstate
Claim #

__Person Making Contact:__ Justin
__Date & Time__: July 07 2025
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on July 7, 2025, with Bryson Brown regarding a motor vehicle accident that occurred on June 29, 2025. The client reported neck and back pain and right knee pain and was placed in a knee brace after EMS transport from LMEMS to St. Mary Hospital on Bluegrass.

Client identification and case details: Bryson Brown, file SHV25-001156, date of birth January 27, 2007. Social Security Number on file: [redacted]. Phone: 502-500-3521. Address on file: 2002 Nelson, Shively, KY 40216. Date of accident: June 29, 2025. Insurance information includes PIP coverage with Allstate, and State Farm claims with Claim Number 1787F478S.

This report was prepared by Justin, with the contact date and time recorded as July 7, 2025.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration
